title: Item Sets and the Black Market Brawlers
body:
(This is a message for RIOT in particular)

Hey RIOT Games, not too long ago, the Black Market Brawlers Queue finished. However, if you go onto a summoner profile and into the item sets section, the black market brawler items are still optional to put into builds. This includes Mercenaries, Upgrades and Game mode specific items.

I was wondering if it was possible to remove the Black Market items so that it isn't so confusing what items are and aren't currently available.

Thanks

replies.body: probably couldve just said "please remove game mode items from item sets kthx"
items sets? who uses items sets!
